issuetype.description: An improvement or enhancement to an existing feature or task.
issuetype.name: Improvement

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description:
h3. Hi,

I have installed appcelerator in Windows 7 for app developemt and android version as 5.0.1. Once I created a new applicatio and tried to run the progam I'm getting 'There are no Android devices connected' this error. Could you please help me to get it resolved.

Thanks in Advance,
Rajeshkumar.
fields.summary: There are no Android devices connected

comments.body:
Hello,
For Android app development you have to install android SDK. Here is the guide to do that. [Documentation Link|http://docs.appcelerator.com/platform/latest/#!/guide/Installing_the_Android_SDK]
For deploying app on device you have to "Enable On-device Developer Options" and then "Enable debugging over USB" on Android device. Here is the guide to do that.[LINK| http://developer.android.com/tools/device.html#developer-device-options]
Once that is done and you connect your device to PC through USB cable you should see your device in device list beside the run option.
Thanks
